review:
In my terms, he is the definition of a true doctor. What a subject depth, down to earth, friendly with patients, always smile on his face. He provides complete picture of the case.

When I walked in with lot of tention with all my reports, he smiled and said I will make sure your kid is running in couple of days. And he just did it. Thank you so much sir.

My child had visited the hospital as he had fallen down. ****** *** **** ** ********** **** I would like to recommend the doctor to other people. There was some waiting time in the hospital when we went. Doctor was friendly.
